properties.title: Henry Dunant Museum
properties.abstract: The Henry Dunant Museum is devoted to the character and life’s work of Henry Dunant, who once lived in Heiden.
properties.description: The museum does not just keep alive memories of the founder of the Red Cross – one room is also devoted to his visions of a world without war. The museum is designed for wheelchair access. Free entry with Swiss museum pass.
properties.name: Appenzellerland Tourismus AR
